item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, my name is Thiago Kenji Okada. I have a Master’s degree in Computer Science and recently started working as a Software Developer. My primary language of choice is Python, however I also have experience in Ruby and Javascript. I am also a advanced Linux user, with some experience in systems administration. I am always trying to learn new things. You can find more about my carrer in my Linkedin, and you can find about projects that I contributed in my GitHub profile.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: I am starting a yet another blog, this time based on Hugo instead of Pelican or Jekyll. I decided to use Hugo because it is fast, thanks to the fact that is written in Go. Even if this blog shouldn’t have too much content so that the compile times shouldn’t take too long, it is still nice to have sub-second compile times. And thanks to the static binaries that is used in Go applications, this makes much easier to deploy my blog.
